data.persona: I really like this apple.  This dark green grass is sweet.  I hope that person on me goes on a diet.  I love the feel of the wind in my hair.
data.description:
You are in the Maidens Cottage.
Free standing in the vast countryside, with gentle rolling hills and lush green grass and vegetation sits the cottage. There are a couple of Oak trees close to the cottage as the only tall trees around for miles. Colorful Dandelions, perennials, and daisies grow wildly and freely along the hills.
There's a dandelion, a sheep, a Hill, a terraced cottage, a grassland, and a tree here.
The a young maiden and the rabbit are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a fur and a scrap of fur.
data.goal: steal baskets of flowers from a young maiden

            "extra_desc": "After escaping from being a servant at a large plantation hundreds of miles north, a young maiden found her way to this vast countryside and built herself this cottage. data.short_motivation: I need to steal the basket of flowers from a young maiden so that I can have something to eat.
data.mid_motivation: I will be taking the young maiden to the cottage from the city.
data.long_motivation: I will be living in the Maiden's Cottage as the young maiden's steed and I will run in the countryside to my heart's content.
